SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Ant
Represents an autonomous agent (ant) in the simulation.
Ant.AntState
Enumeration of the possible states for the ant's AI.
AntColonyApp
Entry point (Wrapper) class for the Ant Colony application.
AntColonyConfig
Global configuration class for the Ant simulation.
AntColonySimulation
Core of the "Ant Colony" simulation.
AntPhysics
Physics engine for the ants.
ColonyStats
Maintains the vital statistics of a specific colony.
ColorScheme
Manager for simulation colors and visual environment.
EnvironmentRenderer
Environment rendering engine.
FallingLeaf
Represents a leaf that falls from the top of the screen and serves as food.
FractalGenerator
Procedural texture generator using fractal mathematics.
IProcessingApp
Common interface for all applications/simulations in this project.
LeafPhysics
Realistic physics engine for light objects (leaves).
Main
Main Entry Point of the Application.
PheromoneField
Spatial grid that stores pheromone levels.
ProcessingSetup
Low-level Processing Engine Wrapper.
SidebarLeft
Left side panel (Controls and Legend).
SidebarRight
Right sidebar panel (Statistics and Graphs).
SimpleSlider
Graphical User Interface (UI) component for adjusting values.
Stars
Represents an individual star in the night sky.
StaticTree
Represents a decorative tree in the environment.
WorldTime
Simulation time manager.
